comments.creator: bzbarsky@mit.edu
comments.text:
We have issues with this all over the place, leading to O(N^2) insertion and removal behavior, O(N^2) reflow (due to having to insert/remove continuations, etc).

We need to come up with a better way to track our line boxes somehow.
comments.author: bzbarsky@mit.edu
comments.raw_text:
We have issues with this all over the place, leading to O(N^2) insertion and removal behavior, O(N^2) reflow (due to having to insert/remove continuations, etc).

We need to come up with a better way to track our line boxes somehow.
